dialog.text: The ground is grass, there is a span of trees on the horizon, and there are some clouds in the sky.
How far up are the grass? What about the lighting?
You can see the sun setting directly above the horizon. The grass fills about two fifths of the bottom of the screen.
I took my first peak. the trees need to be larger, also there are two medium sized trees in the foreground.  Also, the circular sun can be seen directly in the center of the image
Can't quite find a filter with the sun in the middle without completely obscuring the image. How dark is the environment? Is it day or night?
It appears to be either sunrise or sunset. The sun is not as important if you can't get it just right. The clouds are more at the top of the sky then the bottom.
Are you sure? You need a minimum of seven turns in the conversation. Plus, the two foreground trees are in the far left of the screen.
It has been changed to a minimum of five. When I say done I mean I am finished with the information I was given. You are more than welcome to give me more instructions.
